publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1110.1 Annabel Goldie: Gould Report—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1110) in the name of Bruce Crawford, leave out from "recommendation" to "elections" and insert "recommendations calling for the further devolution of executive and legislative powers to the Scottish Government and the Parliament for the conduct of its own elections and the decoupling of future elections to this Parliament and Scotland’s councils".
